reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful, comfortable, and stretchy, with the color being spot on. The material quality receives mixed feedback, with some describing it as nice while others say it feels cheap. The size and fit are also mixed, with some finding it true to size while others say it's too big.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and nice material.
items.body: Very pretty! My daughter (18) wore this to a black tie event and looked stunning! It didn’t look like we bought it from Amazon if you know what I mean. Read more
items.author: abaarfineart

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Disappointed
items.body: Not at all what it looks like in the photo, the back on the one I received had a fully covered back, the front had some ugly ruffle sash dropping down the entire front. It was a small and still to big. This is going back and I was able to find another dress that was beautiful and less expensive. Read more
items.author: Crystal J Borelle

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress
items.body: “Beautiful dress and excellent quality. It fit perfectly and looked just like the photos. I ended up returning it only because it wasn’t exactly what I needed for the event, but otherwise it’s a beautiful dress." Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Xs still a little big in the top
items.body: Nice mesh material. Size fit but a little big around the top for my 14 year old. Perfect burgundy color. Read more
items.author: Sports Mom

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars not worth it
items.body: The fabric looks and feels cheap, the silhouette is wonky (as in the stitching is off / not symmetrical). It is also HUGE, I dont think the sizing chart was accurate. definitely order like two sizes smaller (or don't order at all...) Read more
items.author: Sara Ryan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I needed!
items.body: Bought 3 for my bridesmaids and MOH. All three have different body types and it was perfect for each of them! The material was stretchy and the tie in the back helped to keep it fitted to each person. They held up for all 3 girls from sun up to sun down. Beautiful dresses! Read more
items.author: Hannah Granger

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress, Top too big
items.body: Cute dress, but even with having a large chest, the top was way too big. 36DD, ordered a large, and was way too big. The rest of the dress fit well. The top being tie-able does help, but not enough to make it perfect. Read more
items.author: Kiersten

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not for me
items.body: I had to return it. The top looked different from the picture. It was squarish looking and didn’t flatter the chest area it just looked awkward . I did like the color and the bottom half of the dress though. Read more
items.author: Araceli

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Maxi Sleeveless Split Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Maxi Sleeveless Split Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Wine Red, White, Black, Navy Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
